description:
Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION
Discover thousands of new products and shops.

CONVENIENCE
Fast and secure checkout.
Free shipping & returns within 90 days.
*Other conditions may apply

Visit temu.com or follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/temu/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@temu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shoptemu
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@temu

The Zalando app is your new go-to for quality fashion and lifestyle brands (over 6,000!), outfit and beauty inspiration at your fingertips, and a shopping experience that’s all smooth and no stress.

IT'S GIVING INSPIRATION
• Follow your favourite creators for outfit and styling inspo
• Follow brands you like to see more from them first, including new releases and exclusive collections
• Curate and follow boards of the outfits, videos, and products that inspire you, and start inspiring others
• Explore what’s trending across Europe with Trend Spotter and see what everyone’s wearing in Berlin, Paris, and Milan right now
• Tune into our Live videos to get tips from the experts, product how-tos, and inspo you can add directly to your bag
• Tap into Stories to get your style and culture guide with features like “What do I wear?” plus the latest on major brand collabs
• Save your faves to your wishlist and never miss a size update or price drop

IT'S GIVING CHOICE
• Browse over 11,000 items from a wide range of brands, including all-time fashion favourites
• Dive into our different assortments: clothing, shoes, accessories, sports, beauty and skincare, preloved gems, and kidswear
• Get updates on the things you care about - from news and trends to sales and discount codes
• Hear about new collections and product launches from the brands you love
• Never miss a price drop or restock by opting in to notifications on items in your wishlist
• Give preloved clothing a new life when you shop our extensive selection of pre-owned (but just like new!) clothing, accessories, and boots
Pick your preferred way to pay and enjoy delivery directly to your own doorstep

IT'S GIVING PERSONAL
• Benefit from spot-on recommendations that show you the items you’ll love, without you needing to go looking for them
• Rate how the fashion you’ve ordered fits and get personalised sizing advice as you shop
• Get measured with our measurements tool to find what fits, fast
• Try on outfits in our virtual fitting room to see how they’ll fit before ordering
• Get instant style and outfit advice from the Zalando Assistant, a tailor-made AI-powered fashion assistant to help you on your shopping journey

So, ready to explore the app?
Shop the brands you love, unlock exclusive deals, and get inspiration and recommendations that feel like they were made just for you.

Kupuj z aplikacją Media Expert, gdziekolwiek jesteś i odkrywaj najlepsze rabaty.

Poznaj najnowszą aplikację Media Expert. Dzięki niej możesz wygodnie przeglądać setki tysięcy produktów i złożyć zamówienie w kilku prostych krokach.

Zaglądaj do niej codziennie, a żadna okazja Cię nie ominie. Daj się zaskoczyć szerokością oferty i już dziś sprawdź, co możesz kupić w Media Expert.
 
Co czeka na Ciebie w naszej aplikacji?
- łatwe logowanie i rejestracja,
- pełna oferta Media Expert zamknięta w prostocie nowoczesnej aplikacji mobilnej,
- śledzenie statusów zamówień,
- codziennie nowe zniżki,
- bezpieczne płatności,
- bogate opisy produktów w minimalistycznej formie,
- dodawanie do Schowka, porównywanie oraz udostępnianie ulubionych produktów na wyciągnięcie kciuka,
- opinie milionów Klientów,
- darmowa dostawa,
- sprawdzanie dostępności i terminów dostaw,
- wyszukiwanie podobnych produktów,
- uproszczony Koszyk,
- śledzenie oszczędności z Media Expert Plus,
- dostęp do historii zamówień,
- bezpieczne zapisywanie paragonów i faktur.

The idea is simple: you sell your pre-loved stuff to other members who’ll love it again. They get the thrill of unboxing a great find, you get more space at home. It's look-good, do-good, feel-good, for everyone. 

Selling is easy and free
Snap photos of your item, describe it, and set your price. You keep 100% of what you earn.  
• Cash in on your pre-loved clothes, homeware and appliances, electronics, collectables, kids’ toys, and more. 
• Watch your earnings grow. Send your money straight to your bank account. 
• Buyers cover shipping costs. You get prepaid labels that make things simple. 

Shop new-again finds 				
Feel proud of your second-hand discoveries, from designer gems to great-value tech. 
• Fast finds, long-lasting love. There’s a Vinted category for almost everything, use filters to speed up shopping. 
• We’ve got your back. When you buy on Vinted, we cover you with Buyer Protection. For a small fee, you’ll get a refund if your item is lost, damaged in delivery, or significantly not as described. 
• Choose a shipping carrier and have your order sent to your home or a convenient pick-up point.  

Get added confidence
There are 2 verification services on Vinted to give you peace of mind when trading more expensive pieces. 
Item Verification for designer fashion
Have selected items checked for authenticity by our team of experts. 
Electronics Verification 
For certain tech items, get the functionality, condition, and authenticity verified. 
You’ll only receive items that pass the check, or get a refund. Opt to buy verification during checkout. 

There’s a diverse community of second-hand enthusiasts waiting to meet you. Chat with your fellow members, get updates, and manage your orders all in one place. 

Come join us
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@vinted 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vinted
Find out more in our Help Centre: https://www.vinted.co.uk/help

The IKEA mobile app is where your inspiration comes to life. Find that cute armchair you saw at your friend’s place or look through thousands of products and ideas just for you - to make your space truly your own.

Whether you’re looking to buy online or in-store, the IKEA app is your perfect shopping companion.

Scan the products while you walk through the store  - and skip the checkout line.

Are you planning a big project or small home improvements? Save and organise your favourites in lists for later. They are ready when you are!

Found the perfect IKEA furniture or home decoration? Let us do the heavy lifting. Order home delivery and be informed every step of the way, by tracking your order easily in the app.

The IKEA app is also a convenient home for your IKEA Family benefits. Access your IKEA Family card quickly and find all your past receipts conveniently in one location.

IKEA values your data privacy and believes in ethical use of customer data. That’s why you’re in control of all your data at all times.

Discover the free Sinsay app - your favorite place to shop online!

Discover the latest trends and fashion inspirations without leaving your home.

Fashion for everyone! We offer a wide selection of clothes and accessories - women's, men's, children's and baby's fashion. You will find everything you need here - from elegant dresses, through comfortable jeans, T-shirts, to stylish accessories and footwear. Also check out our range of cosmetics that perfectly fit into current trends.

A home full of style! At Sinsay you can buy home decorations and other accessories that will change any interior. Create your dream space and don't overpay.

Inspirations and trends! Keep up to date with the latest trends and draw inspiration from our styles. Perfect fashion for everyone is right here!

Attractive promotions! Check the app every day and take advantage of special discount campaigns! Scratch cards, Product of the Day, challenges and many promotions that will make you pay less.

Sinsay Club loyalty program! Join and enjoy unique benefits! For every purchase you collect points that you can exchange for coupons worth up to -XX EUR. Become our regular customer and take advantage of attractive offers only for Club members.
 	
Sinsay Club loyalty program! Join and enjoy unique benefits! For every purchase you collect points that you can exchange for coupons worth up to -XX EUR. Become our regular customer and take advantage of attractive offers only for Club members.

Easy, fast and... attractively priced! The intuitive application will allow you to go through the shopping process in a few simple steps, and attractive prices and a wide selection of clothes give you the opportunity to buy many styles for every occasion.

Functionality! Track the status of your order, add products to Favorites, use returns without a receipt, receive notifications about new products and attractive promotions. All this in one place!

Download the Sinsay application today and join the world of fashion, inspiration and unique opportunities!

Pobierz aplikację i otrzymaj nawet 100 zł w postaci czterech kuponów, do wykorzystania na pierwsze zakupy w aplikacji. Ponadto skorzystaj z ponad 60 000 produktów z niższymi cenami dostępnymi tylko z aplikacją.

Aplikacja Empik gwarantuje szybki dostęp do ponad dwóch milionów produktów w Twoim telefonie. Są podzielone na kilkanaście kategorii produktowych, by możliwe było bezproblemowe odnalezienie interesującej pozycji. Kupuj, przeglądaj, sprawdzaj jednym kliknięciem! Z aplikacją Empik zawsze otrzymujesz specjalne oferty dedykowane dla Ciebie, atrakcyjne zniżki, możliwość dostawy zamówienia pod Twoje drzwi lub do wybranego salonu Empik.
 
Aplikacja Empik podsunie Ci najlepsze możliwe rozwiązania, wspierając zakupy offline! Jest intuicyjna w obsłudze, dlatego stanie się Twoim najlepszym możliwym doradcą, podczas przeszukiwania pozycji filmowych, muzycznych, książkowych. Śledź aktualne bestsellery, sprawdzaj zapowiedzi, nowości książkowe, wykorzystuj okazje i zdobywaj zniżki. Z aplikacją Empik masz to wszystko pod ręką w swoim telefonie!
 
Oszczędzaj czas i pieniądze! Przekonaj się o ogromie zalet, jakie daje kupowanie online. Dostęp do elektroniki, artykułów dla domu i ogrodu, zabawek, kosmetyków i wiele więcej, jeszcze nigdy nie był tak prosty! Z aplikacją Empik podejmiesz wyłącznie trafne decyzje, odnajdziesz wymarzone prezenty, będziesz na bieżąco z nowościami, a darmowa dostawa do salonu Empik pozwoli Ci dodatkowo zaoszczędzić.
 
Przeglądaj tysiące pozycji w dowolnym miejscu! Z aplikacją Empik możesz robić zakupy w niedziele, wybrać dostawę do punktów odbioru i w krótkim czasie cieszyć się wymarzoną pozycją. To coś więcej niż sklep online - Empik app to inspiracje zakupowe, Twój prywatny doradca, który przekazuje wyłącznie sprawdzone propozycje, dopasowane do Twojego indywidualnego gustu.
 
Program Empik Premium to kolejny plus posiadania aplikacji. Dzięki niemu otrzymujesz zniżki na wybrane produkty, oferty specjalne dopasowane do Twoich zainteresowań. Aplikacja zapamiętuje Twoje zakupy, nie musisz gromadzić paragonów - jeśli zechcesz zwrócić jakiś produkt, wystarczy przekazać kartę sprzedawcy. Empik Premium to także dostęp do najciekawszych wydarzeń, najgłośniejszych premier książkowych, muzycznych, filmowych i wiele więcej! Już żadne widowisko Cię nie ominie. Co więcej, możesz dowolnie układać listy prezentów zarówno dla siebie, jak i dla swoich bliskich, skanować telefonem książki, filmy, płyty, gry i tworzyć własne wirtualne biblioteczki, którymi możesz dzielić się w sieci.
 
Z aplikacją Empik bez problemu zamówisz interesujące Cię pozycje z dostawą do domu lub jednego z wybranych salonów Empik zupełnie za darmo! Nie trać czasu na szukanie książek, filmów, muzyki, gier stacjonarnie - rób zakupy online za pomocą kilku kliknięć w dowolnym miejscu i porze! Do wyboru masz setki punktów odbioru w całej Polsce, oferty Marketplace i miliony produktów - gry komputerowe, elektronika, książki, płyty, filmy, gry i wiele więcej!
 
Zyskasz:
-  zniżki na specjalnie wybrane dla Ciebie produkty,
-  bieżące informacje o nowościach i wydarzeniach kulturalnych - dopasowane do Twojego indywidualnego gustu,
-  możliwość zwrotu produktów bez paragonu w ciągu 30 dni,
-  możliwość sprawdzenia dostępności produktów w najbliższym salonie,
-  opcje rezerwowania produktu i możliwość jego odbioru tego samego dnia,
-  darmowa dostawa do salonu lub rezerwacja z odbiorem w salonie już po 2 godzinach.
-  dostęp do oferty Marketplace z czołowymi sprzedawcami, jak Tagomago, Janshop, Meble Akord, B-Elektronik, Trena, Topeshop.

Dodatkowo, korzystając z aplikacji Empik, wspierasz biblioteki szkolne każdym zakupem!
 
Postaw na szybkość działania aplikacji, wygodę, intuicyjność obsługi, dostarczanie specjalnie wyselekcjonowanych, spersonalizowanych treści, które stuprocentowo trafią w Twój gust. Kupuj taniej z aplikacją Empik i ciesz się wyjątkowymi promocjami, jakie oferuje program Empik Premium!

Do your shopping on the Sephora app: have access to over 16,000 makeup, fragrance, beauty brands and much more! 
Benefit from numerous exclusive promotions, make-up and skincare tutorials on the app. You'll be able to book an appointment with an expert in one of our stores and share your experience with the Sephora beauty community! 

This is your chance to take advantage of the various features now available on the Sephora app.

*SHOP FOR YOUR BEAUTY PRODUCTS
- Access all our products and accessories. Some of our products are even available in preview on the app.

- Discover our wide range of products: perfume, cream, day cream, tonic lotion, nourishing oil, hair mask, matifying care, mascara, eyeshadow palettes, foundation, lipstick, lip gloss...

- Find your favorite cosmetic brands, fragrances and beauty tools like Huda Beauty, Too Faced, Benefit Cosmetics, Urban Decay, Fenty Beauty, Kat von D, Beauty Blender, Charlotte Tilbury, Rare Beauty,Yves Saint Laurent, Christian Dior, Gucci, Make Up Forever ,Clarins, Lancôme, Clinique, Estée Lauder, Givenchy, Guerlain, Kenzo, Paco Rabanne, Jo Malone London, Armani, Bobbi Brown, Marc Jacobs Beauty, Dyson, Kérastase, Sephora Collection...!
- You'll also find all the products from Sephora Collection, an inspiring and ever-evolving.

Don't miss out on the facial care products, including the anti-imperfection serum that will purify your face, the aloe vera hand masks, not forgetting the wide range of eyeshadow palettes.

- Use our WISHLIST feature to save your favorite beauty products and fragrances.
- Enjoy exclusive promotions on makeup, perfumes, nail polishes, skincare, beauty accessories...
- Take advantage of Click&Collect even on the app.
- Smooth, easy navigation for fast, stress-free shopping!
- Feel free to check out our special offers/deals category. You'll discover all our current offers for successful make-up in collaboration with superb brands. 
You'll also be able to take advantage of free products (miniatures) above a certain purchase amount.

*IN NEED OF INSPIRATION?
- Many beauty tutorials are available on the app.
- Find all our tips, tricks and makeup, skincare and haircare trends, for the perfect look.
- Take advantage of personalized recommendations during your shopping session on the Sephora app.

*DISCOVER OUR BEAUTY SERVICES EVEN IN STORE
- Find the nearest Sephora store to your location and everywhere else.
- Book an appointment at the makeup bar for a complete makeover or at the Benefit Brow bar for eyebrow waxing, eyebrow tinting or false eyelash application....
- Our cosmetics experts will take good care of you, and you can enjoy a personalized makeup session in-store according to your desires.

*EXPERIENCE SEPHORA WITH OUR BEAUTY BOARD
- Join our beauty community and share your reviews on the Sephora app.
- Get inspired by the trendy looks created by our community.
- Discover your favorite makeup products, fragrances, looks, treatments and beauty routines on the BEAUTY BOARD.
- Shop and share your different looks and new make-up routines with the community.

***

The team is always ready to pamper you.

Thank you for using the SEPHORA app!

Love the online shopping with efootwear.eu

Do you appreciate fashion? Do you want to show your style? Do you want to keep an eye on the latest trends in fashion? Are you looking for the perfect footwear for an important event, for a gym, for the summer, for the winter...? In the efootwear.eu online store app you will quickly and easily find shoes for every occasion! 
At home, on a trip or on a walk...? Thanks to our app you can make online shopping wherever you want. Intuitive patch to purchase and friendly interface will help you to easily find and buy fashionable shoes.
A wide range of women's, men's and children's shoes, available on efootwear.eu, gives you the opportunity to shop for the whole family in one online store. 
You can choose from over 80 thousand models from 450 of the most popular world brands at competitive pricing.
You want to be up to date with the latest trends and the best deals? l
In the efootwear.eu app you will find fashion inspirations and you will be the first to know about our new products and best offers!  There are hundreds of top brands and the latest trends from global manufacturers waiting for you!

With the efootwear.eu app:
- you will be the first to know about the latest collections and best deals
- you can easily find your dream models of shoes, bags and accessories with functional filters and a barcode scanner
- you can quickly make purchases and payments online
- you monitor your shipping status and can track your order
- you will create lists of your favourite products

You may know us under the brand names: eobuwie.pl,  obuvki.bg, ecipele.hr, eobuv.cz, chaussures.fr, epapoutsia.gr, zapatos.es, eavalynė.lt, eschuhe.de, epantofi.ro, eskor.se, eobuv.sk, eobutev.si, ecipo.hu, escarpe.it, eapavi.lv

Do you have any questions? 
At this address: https://eobuwie.com.pl/kontakt you will find all the ways to contact our company. 

Personal data
In order to use the application, we will ask you to provide basic personal information. But don't worry, with us they are completely safe! You can access your data at any time and have the right to correct or delete it. The administrator of your personal data is MODIVO.COM S.A (Nowy Kisielin - Naukowa 15, 66-002 Zielona Góra Street; e-mail: info@modivo.com, telephone: 00 4868 422 84 04). You can also contact our data protection officer: iod@eobuwie.com.pl.

The InPost Mobile app is a convenient way to receive, send and return parcels via a Parcel Locker®. In addition, the app allows you to track your shipments and make online purchases from various online shops with InPost Pay. Simple as ever!

The InPost lottery is on!
Play for an apartment in Gdańsk and apartment in Kraków, as well as over 42 million instant prizes. Participate until February 28, 2026. The organizer of the lottery for participants in the InPost loyalty program is Unique One sp. z o.o. Regulations: www.uniqueone.pl/regulaminy


Shop the shortcut way with InPost Pay.
Select the InPost Pay button in a participating online store and complete your purchase in the InPost app — no logging in, no forms, no email overload. You only register with InPost Pay once—and shop securely with a single click. From payment to delivery—fast and convenient. All your order details, including statuses and delivery notifications, are in one app. Discover a new dimension of online shopping!

Sending without a label

You can send your parcel conveniently with InPost Mobile – without printing a shipping label, 24/7, via any Parcel Locker®. All you have to do is open the locker remotely with one click, scan the QR code, or enter the shipping code on the screen of the Parcel Locker®!

Opening the locker remotely

One of the main features of the app is remote locker opening – no need to touch the Paczkomat® screen. Just tap “Open locker remotely” and it will open on its own!

Extending the collection deadline

App users can easily extend the pickup time for their Paczkomat® parcel by 24 hours. Twelve hours before the deadline, a “Extend” button will appear in the app – just tap it, pay, and you’re all set!

Returning packages quickly and conveniently

Tired of online shopping returns? Not with us. Every InPost Mobile user can conveniently return a parcel to partner stores! You do not need to print a shipping label, just fill in the return details and send the parcel from any Parcel Locker®.

Redirecting courier parcels without any problem

Not home for your InPost courier? Click “Redirect” in the app and choose a new delivery option: Parcel Locker®, PUDO point, or a neighbour’s address.

Placing a parcel in the Ease of Access Zone

The Ease of Access Zone is a solution that allows parcels to be delivered to lower lockers in the Parcel Locker®. This functionality is meant for people with disabilities and those short of stature. If you want the parcel to be placed in the Zone, select the "Activate" button in the details of the parcel.

Picking up shipments using the Multi-locker functionality

Multi-locker is an option that allows you to receive multiple parcels from a single locker in a Parcel Locker®. Packages that have been included in the Multi-locker are collected in the app in one message and highlighted in blue.

Parcel Lockers® are always close to you

You can easily find any Parcel Locker® or PUDO point in the app. All you need to do is click on the map and, if you have location services enabled, the application will show you the nearest InPost delivery points.

Always know where your package is

Using the app, you can keep track of all the shipments you are waiting for. Notifications will keep you up to date with changes in shipment status. Your shipments ordered in the last 30 days, will be visible in the app after logging in.

Paying cashless for cash on delivery shipments

You can pay for COD shipments with PayByLink transfers - a simple and convenient solution that gives you freedom and full control over your order.

You create the application TOGETHER with us!

We regularly update the product, responding to user suggestions. The InPost Mobile app is supposed to be first and foremost for you, so we always listen to what you have to say.

Thanks to the app you will find out what is fashionable. Discover hundreds of new products, stay up to date with trends and find out about the hottest bestsellers. Get inspired and create the perfect outfits. In the MODIVO app you have access to your purchase history and you can create a list of your favorite products! There are also special, dedicated promotions waiting for you. Join our app and be ahead of everyone - users are the first to receive information about discounts on the site.

Contact
Do you have any questions? At this address: https://modivo.pl/kontakt you will find all possible communication channels through which you can contact us!

Personal data
Cookies may be installed on your device to improve the operation of the application and enable the processing of your personal data. The administrator of personal data collected via the application or obtained based on your activity in the application is MODIVO.COM S.A based in Zielona Góra. We may process your data in particular for the purpose of performing the contract, for contact and marketing purposes, including profiling. You have the right to transfer, access, rectify and limit processing, and withdraw consent to processing. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office. More information about the processing of your data by us can be found in the Privacy Policy.

developer: Grupa OLX Sp. z o. o.
description:
OLX to sprytny wybór dla wszystkich:

• Sprytny wybór dla Ciebie. Szukasz lepszej pracy? A może kogoś, kto naprawi kran? Tu znajdziesz wszystko!
• Sprytny wybór dla Twojego portfela. Upoluj unikalne okazje albo rozkręć własny biznes.
• Sprytny wybór dla naszej planety. Kupuj rzeczy używane i sprzedawaj to, czego już nie potrzebujesz.

Aplikacja OLX to najprostszy sposób, aby znaleźć, kupić i sprzedać niemal wszystko:

• Praca w wielu różnych branżach
• Domy i mieszkania do kupienia lub wynajęcia
• Nowe i używane samochody, motocykle oraz inne pojazdy
• Remonty, imprezy, przeprowadzki, sprzątanie i mnóstwo innych usług
• Nowe i używane produkty oraz towary, od ubrań, przez elektronikę, po meble
• Całe mnóstwo innych rzeczy!

Z aplikacją OLX znajdziesz wszystko, co chcesz, wszędzie, gdzie jesteś i zawsze, gdy potrzebujesz. Pobierz ją teraz:

• Wybieraj spośród milionów ogłoszeń z całej Polski i w różnorodnych kategoriach.

• Obserwuj ogłoszenia i wyszukiwania. Miej oko na wszystko, co Cię interesuje i otrzymuj powiadomienia, gdy pojawi się coś nowego lub cena spadnie.

• Dodawaj własne ogłoszenia. Rób zdjęcia wprost przez aplikację, dołóż tytuł oraz opis i wybierz kategorię.

• Udostępniaj. Dziel się swoimi ulubionymi ogłoszeniami ze znajomymi przez aplikacje, takie jak WhatsApp czy Messenger.


• Zarządzaj. Edytuj lub zakończ wybrane ogłoszenia albo je odświeżaj, aby dotarły do jeszcze większej liczby osób.

• Rozmawiaj z kupującymi i sprzedającymi. Dopytuj o szczegóły, negocjuj cenę, wysyłaj dodatkowe zdjęcia. Udostępniaj swoją lokalizację przez aplikację, aby jeszcze lepiej zadbać o bezpieczeństwo.

• Bezpiecznie wysyłaj i odbieraj zakupy. Korzystaj z komfortowych Przesyłek OLX.

Notino: The whole beauty world in your pocket, anywhere, anytime!

Notino is the largest European online store selling cosmetics and perfumes. We have almost everything in stock from more than 1,500 global brands. Plus offers tailored to suit your tastes, authentic reviews and lots of smart tools to help you choose the right foundation, lipstick or perfume.

Fall in love with Notino today

⁕  App-only offers
Direct access to the best prices, special offers created just for you and available only in the app. Be the first to know about all of our discounts and offers!

⁕ Wishlist
Keep all your beauty favourites in one place, create a shopping list or use Wishlist to hunt for a better deal!

⁕ Reviews
Are you afraid to purchase new beauty products without any personal experience? We've got loads of verified reviews from our customers at Notino to help you with your decision.

⁕ Virtual Try On
Try our Virtual Try On, which shows you how a given shade of lipstick, foundation or eyeshadow will look on you thanks to the selfie mode on your camera. It’s fun ;-)

⁕ Fast, simple and safe shopping
Search, choose, then pay and look forward to receiving your package, which is usually sent the same day!

And that’s not all… Notino will be your endless source of inspiration thanks to our professional blog or our regular live streams ;-)

See you in the Notino app!

The Nike App is your personal guide to all things Nike. ​​Become a Member ​​​and​​ get​​ exclusive ​access ​to ​the latest from Nike and Jordan. Shop innovative sport styles, curated clothing collections, and trending trainers. Unlock ​​Member Rewards, personalised ​​style advice, and easy shipping and returns, all in one seamless shopping app.

SHOP BETTER AS A MEMBER
Shop shoes, gear, sportswear, and streetwear. Kids’, women’s, or men’s clothing– check out the latest trainers and sport essentials from Nike and Jordan.
• Member Profile: View Activity, orders, and purchase history. Buy sportswear, sneakers, and accessories with the Nike online shopping app.
• Shopping App with Member Rewards: Celebrate big moments like your birthday & Member anniversary.
• Shop Exclusive Products: Shopping is better as a Member. Unlock exclusive sportswear and trainers from Jordan. Plus, get first dibs on new, upcoming, and seasonal releases dropping weekly. Shop Jordan, Air Max Dn8, P-6000, Nike Mercurial Football Boots, Vomero 18, and more.
• Jordan Mode: Shop the latest in Jordan clothing and sneakers, plus unlock exclusive content available only in Jordan Mode. Explore basketball shoes, seasonal women’s and men’s clothing collections, and sneaker releases from Jordan.
• Nike by You: Shop and customise iconic Nike shoes with curated colour palettes and premium materials that match your style.

SERVICES THAT CONNECT & GUIDE YOU
Finding your favourite clothing and sports essentials is easier with the Nike shopping app. Be the first to score the latest sneakers when you turn on notifications. Chat one-on-one with a Nike Expert for style advice on our sneakers and clothing.
• Notifications: Never miss a sneaker drop. Jordan drops, the latest apparel, athlete collaborations, events, and more are yours to discover when you turn on push notifications.
• Training & Coaching for all: Expert advice delivered by Nike athletes, coaches, and personal trainers. Receive training tips with your Nike community from wherever you are.
• Nike Experts: Get sport and style advice from our Nike experts. Chat in real-time for guidance on all things Nike and Jordan.
• Exclusive Nike Experiences: Find Member-only events in your city and attend IRL or online. Join your Nike community.
• Shop Online with Athlete Guidance: Get exclusive access to expert advice, personalised shopping recommendations, and Member-only perks.

STORIES THAT INSPIRE & INFORM YOU
Nike is more than a shopping app. Find in-depth stories spanning across sport and culture, delivered daily. Follow your favourite athletes, sports teams, and products to get the most from the Nike App.
• Member Home: Explore new, curated Nike stories, refreshed daily.
• Clothing Trends & Trainers: Find new ways to wear your favourite Nike styles, accessories, and footwear.
• Sportswear Collections: Trainers, football boots, accessories, sportswear, or workout clothing– learn what gear empowers the top Nike athletes.

Discover a shopping app with Member benefits and explore the latest from Nike and Jordan. Unlock exclusive apparel, style recommendations, in-person experiences, and the newest sneaker releases.

Download today and experience shopping as a Nike Member.

Comprehensive
Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.com.be and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.
 
Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 
 
Secure

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn, Amazon.co.jp or Amazon.com.be from a single app.

If your device supports TrueDepth technology, the app will use your device camera to detect your facial movements only while using certain features such as virtually try-on products like sunglasses. All information processed using this technology remains on your device and is not otherwise stored, processed or shared by Amazon.

developer: ZABKA POLSKA SP Z O O
description:
Zainstaluj aplikację Żappka na swoim smartfonie. Zbieraj żappsy i wymieniaj je na nagrody, podejmuj wyzwania, sprawdzaj aktualne promocje i odkrywaj oferty specjalne w sklepach. Zakupy nigdy nie były tak proste i pełne korzyści!

Aplikacja Żappka to:

Żappsy i nagrody

Skanuj swój kod podczas zakupów i zbieraj żappsy. Im więcej kupujesz, tym więcej zyskujesz! Wymieniaj żappsy na nagrody – baton, gorąca kawa, zimny napój czy ulubiona przekąska. Każdy znajdzie coś dla siebie! Pamiętaj, że żappsy zebrane od 01.11 do 31.10 przepadają, jeśli nie wymienisz ich na nagrody do 31.12. Nie przegap okazji na jeszcze więcej korzyści!

Promocje dla Ciebie

Żappka oferuje promocje skrojone na Twoją miarę. Odkrywaj oferty specjalne w sklepach i korzystaj z rabatów na ulubione produkty. Każda promocja to okazja do oszczędzania – nawet do 50%! Spraw, by codzienne zakupy były jeszcze bardziej opłacalne. Dzięki aplikacji zawsze jesteś na bieżąco z najnowszymi promocjami i możesz szybko sprawdzić, co jest dostępne w pobliskich sklepach.

Wyzwania i konkursy

Podejmuj wyzwania zakupowe i zdobywaj niesamowite nagrody – od rejsów, przez bilety na koncerty, aż po gorące hot dogi. Bierz udział w konkursach, odkrywaj nowe promocje i zdobywaj dodatkowe żappsy lub produkty. Dzięki aplikacji możesz uczestniczyć w wyjątkowych akcjach i zdobywać bonusy za swoje zakupy – nigdy nie było to tak proste!

Nowy, intuicyjny układ aplikacji

Odkryj kafelki i poziome menu na dole ekranu, które sprawiają, że poruszanie się po aplikacji jest jeszcze wygodniejsze. Eksploruj Żappkę w nowym wydaniu, odkrywaj szeroki asortyment sklepów i korzystaj z najlepszych ofert! Sprawdź wyzwanie powitalne, które przeprowadzi Cię przez wszystkie funkcje nowej aplikacji – na końcu czeka nagroda!

Żabki Nano

Dodaj swoją kartę i korzystaj ze swobody bezobsługowych zakupów. Odkrywaj Nano w Żappce, sprawdzaj promki oraz produkty za żappsy. Szybko, wygodnie, bezobsługowo – zakupy w promocji jeszcze nigdy nie były tak łatwe! Wszystko, co potrzebujesz, jest teraz w zasięgu ręki.

Wygodne usługi w Żabce

Korzystaj z aplikacji, aby upraszczać swoje codzienne zakupy. Dzięki integracji z usługami Maczfit, Dietly, Jush i delio, możesz:

- Zamawiać zakupy z dostawą – szybko i wygodnie.
- Wybierać diety z dostawą dostosowane do Twoich potrzeb.
- Korzystać z cateringu dietetycznego.

To nie wszystko! W aplikacji znajdziesz także:

- Przewodnik po cateringach, aby ułatwić wybór najlepszego rozwiązania.
- Usługi naprawy telefonu.
- Doładowania gier online – idealne dla graczy.
- Gry Lotto z szybkimi wynikami.
- Paysafecard do bezpiecznych płatności.
- Paczki – nadawaj i odbieraj bez problemu.
- Startery GSM dostępne na miejscu.

Odkrywaj oferty specjalne, korzystaj z szerokiego asortymentu i realizuj codzienne zakupy w sklepach Żabki. Promocje nigdy nie były tak dostępne, a Twoje codzienne życie jeszcze prostsze i wygodniejsze.

Ważna informacja!

Numer telefonu jest wymagany, aby korzystać z pełni możliwości aplikacji. Dlaczego?

Personalizacja: Spersonalizowane oferty i promocje dopasowane do Twoich potrzeb.
Funkcjonalności: Uzyskaj dostęp do Żabki Nano, subskrypcji i Żappka Pay.
Komunikacja: Otrzymuj powiadomienia o promocjach i ważnych zmianach.
Bezpieczeństwo: Zapewnij sobie dodatkową ochronę konta i transakcji.
Rozwój: Korzystaj z nowych funkcji i rozszerzeń aplikacji, które stale udoskonalamy.

Wejdź do aplikacji, wprowadź i potwierdź numer telefonu, aby korzystać ze wszystkich możliwości Żappki! Masz pytania? Napisz na kontakt@zabka.pl. Odkrywaj świat Żappki i ciesz się zakupami jak nigdy dotąd!

Met de Action app heb je nu 24/7 toegang tot al het leuks waar je normaal gesproken voor naar de Action winkel gaat. Je bent als eerste op de hoogte van de laatste weekacties en de nieuwste producten. Zie je iets leuks of iets dat je nodig hebt? Voeg het dan meteen toe aan je favorieten! Zo vergeet je nooit meer een boodschap. Dit wil je natuurlijk niet missen. Download snel de app en laat je verrassen door de vele leuke en handige mogelijkheden!
 
* Alles van Action altijd bij de hand  Met de Action app blijf je op de hoogte van al het verrassende dat je van Action gewend bent. Je ontvangt als eerste de beste weekacties, nieuwste producten en het laatste nieuws.

* Verrassende artikelen, speciaal voor jou geselecteerd Geef in de app je interesses aan en Action toont je de producten die het beste bij jou passen.

* Stel een lijst samen van al je favoriete producten Met zó veel verassende producten vergeet je soms welke je ook alweer wilde hebben. Voeg ze toe aan je favorieten. Zo vergeet je nooit meer een boodschap! En het mooie is dat je je favorieten op elk van je apparaten kunt bekijken.

* Gebruik de handige productscanner voor meer info Wil je meer informatie over een artikel? Met de app maak je van je telefoon in mum van tijd een scanner. Zo zie je in de winkel (of thuis) precies wat je wilt weten.

* Al je kassabonnen digitaal én op één plek Al je Action kassabonnen vind je nu netjes bij elkaar in de app. Scan je digitale klantenkaart wanneer je wat koopt in de winkel en de digitale bon verschijnt automatisch in de app.

Laat je inspireren door 6000+ artikelen
Scrol op je gemak door de app en laat je verrassen door de meer dan 6000 artikelen die Action je dagelijks te bieden heeft. Er is zo veel dat je gewoon niet uitgekeken raakt!

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

The fall season for shopping is here! With Allegro, you can catch the best deals and prepare for any weather. Discover thousands of products and enjoy convenient shopping, wherever you are. Get your wardrobe ready for cooler days, find ideal items for home and garden, and equip yourself with the latest electronics.

On Allegro, you will find everything you need:
Clothes for fall: Warm sweaters, stylish coats, comfortable ankle boots
Electronics: New smartphones, laptops, TV sets, drones, gaming equipment, and smartwatches
Home and Garden: Style your home for fall, prepare your garden for winter, find furniture, lighting, and decorations
Hobby: Books for long evenings, board games, sports accessories, and art supplies.
Beauty: Cosmetics for skin care and make-up, perfume, hair accessories.

Shopping in the palm of your hand:
- Easy shopping, fast payments: Buy conveniently, pay with Apple Pay, BLIK, card, or a different method of your choice
- Comfort at any time: Do you like browsing offers in the evening? Switch to dark mode and shop comfortably without straining your eyes
- Tried-and-tested products, trusted sellers: See reviews from other buyers to make sure that you choose what is best. You can easily add your own review, too!
- The list fo your Favorites: Add products to favorites to revisit them later, and share interesting offers with your friends
- Delivery tracking: With widgets, you can quickly see the status of your shipment
- Quick search: Do you search with images? Or perhaps you scan barcodes? With Image Search and Price Scanner, you will find products immediately
- Virtual wallet: Store loyalty cards from your favorite places
- Air quality: Check the air quality in your area thanks to sensors mounted on Allegro One Box machines
- Millions of products, plenty of inspiration: Choose among millions of products from different categories

Discover new functions in the Allegro app appreciated by millions of users that launched on the market more than 10 years ago.

Would you like to have free deliveries and returns?
In the app, you can also use Allegro Smart! and save on deliveries. Just pay once and enjoy free deliveries for an entire year or month.

Allegro Smart! offers great advantages:
- unlimited free deliveries with purchases over 45 PLN to parcel lockers and pick-up points and over 65 PLN by courier - free returns of shipments via parcel lockers and pick-up points,
- access to Smart! Deals — products at lower prices only for Allegro Smart! members,
- priority processing of Allegro Buyer Protection requests

All offers available with Smart! delivery have a special Smart! badge. You can find the details in the service Terms & Conditions.

Allegro App is:

- the greatest selection — over 250 million offers from various categories, like Kids (e.g., Toys, Educational Games, Clothing, Shoes, Strollers, School Supplies — Calculators, Notepads, Study Aids), Games, Home and Garden (e.g., Tools, Lighting, Smart Home, Garden Furniture), Electronics (e.g., Photography, Smartphones and Cell Phones, Smartwatches, Tablets, Computers, Audio, Video and Household Appliances, Consoles and Gaming Machines), Automotive (including Cars, Car Care Products, Tires and Rims, Garage Tools and Equipment), Health (including Blood Pressure Monitors and Accessories, Thermometers, Alternative Medicine, Medicine Cabinet Essentials, Humidifiers, Air Purifiers), Supermarket (e.g., Groceries, Healthy Foods), Fashion (including Clothing, Shoes, Accessories, Jewelry and Watches), Culture and Entertainment (e.g., Movies, Musical Instruments, Coupons and Top-Ups, Music, Games), Sports and Travel (e.g., Bicycles and Accessories, Running Clothes and "Running Shoes, Gym Accessories), as well as concert tickets and many more

developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
description:
LIDL PLUS: Find Food Deals, Grocery Coupons and Shopping Rewards on the Products You Love! The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Incredible grocery discounts every time you shop with Lidl! ‘Straight in my basket!’ 

Download, register and save even more. Lidl Plus is our new rewards app, designed to give you discounts on the products you love. 

The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Available in Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland, Great Britain and Malta. 

We’ll send you Lidl coupons based on the products that you love. Simply activate your coupons and scan in store to make incredible savings on your Lidl shopping. 

Every time you shop, you will also get the chance to win amazing prizes*. So what’s not to like? Check out the best things about the Lidl Plus loyalty app and how to use it.

HOW TO GET LIDL PLUS LOYALTY REWARDS:

 - Activate your coupons in the app and scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till to redeem and save money on your shop.
 - Scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till for the chance to win great prizes* on each store visit!
 -  Never lose a receipt again. You’ll get a purchase summary and a digital copy of your receipt with Lidl Plus.
 -  Never miss another offer. Browse through a digital version of our weekly leaflet in the app.

Plus many more exciting features!

We made this app to reward you for shopping at Lidl and to help you find deals on your favourite foods, drinks and household items. 

From amazing food coupons to saving money on your next shop – Lidl Plus is the app to download if you want to get the best food deals and shopping discounts. We’re always looking to help you enjoy quality products at great prices, so download our free loyalty app and register today and find food deals, shopping rewards and grocery coupons on the products you love.

*This feature is not available in all countries.

When joining the Lidl Plus program, you can allow tracking technology, which helps us to understand how you interact with the app. This includes what pages you visit, what coupons you view, and how long you spend on each page. This tracking allows Lidl Plus to improve the app and provide you with tailored communication, discounts and to participate in relevant surveys.

You may not use or make any purchases via the Lounge by Zalando App (the “App”) outside of the countries in which Lounge by Zalando operates and which are presented as choices for you on the App (such countries, the “Permitted Areas”). To make a purchase on the App, you must be physically located within a Permitted Area and provide a delivery address or pickup address and billing address within a Permitted Area. Further, even if you place an order for delivery or pickup in your area, you are prohibited from changing the delivery or pickup address, as well as your billing address, to an address outside of a Permitted Area. By using the App, you expressly agree that no sales via the App are permitted outside of the Permitted Areas and that you will not use or attempt to use the App to make any purchases outside of the Permitted Areas. 

ZALANDO MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, AND EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, THAT THE APP IS APPROPRIATE OR AVAILABLE FOR USE IN OTHER LOCATIONS OUTSIDE OF THE PERMITTED AREAS. Those who access or use the App from other jurisdictions do so at their own volition and are entirely responsible for compliance with all applicable local laws and regulations.  Unless otherwise explicitly stated, all materials found on the App are solely directed to individuals located in the Permitted Areas.

By using the App, you agree and consent to have your personal data collected, used, transferred to and processed in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice.  If you do not agree to the collection of your data in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice, you must stop using the App immediately.

ANSWEAR

Enter the world of premium fashion at your fingertips. 
With the Answear app, shopping becomes an exciting experience – inspiring, fast and convenient. New arrivals every day, exclusive promotions and access to your favorite brands in one app – for her, for him, for kids – from streetwear to luxury collections.

At Answear, we dispatch your order from our warehouse and deliver it in one parcel.

YOU CAN ALWAYS CHANGE YOUR MIND

Find your favourite products from perfume, make-up and skincare to lifestyle. Shop popular cosmetics brands such as Benefit, Urban Decay and Kylie Cosmetics and scroll through our online perfumery to find high-quality fragrances from Chanel to Dior. You'll also find trendy skincare brands such as The Ordinary and Rituals - for a radiant complexion and your wellness break. Pamper your hair with exclusive care highlights from KÉRASTASE and Redken. Fall in love with new products and trends such as K-beauty, clean beauty and organic cosmetics every day with the Douglas app - the smallest make-up bag in the world is waiting for you!

Your exclusive benefits:

- DOUGLAS BEAUTY CARD: Collect valuable Douglas Beauty Points with every purchase in the app or in our shops.

- DOUGLAS BEAUTY MIRROR: Test make-up looks with a mirror of a special kind! Discover lipsticks, foundations, mascaras & co. that set you off perfectly. Our augmented reality tool acts like a filter over your face and shows you currently highlighted products and different styles. Wedding look, nude make-up or French chic? You decide!

- PURCHASE FUNCTION: Reorder your beauty and perfume favourites with just a few clicks. Have all your empties been replenished already? Then pause the repurchase or remove the product from the repurchase list. Turn the Douglas app into your personalised shopping list!

- LIVE SHOPPING EVENTS: Discover highlighted products and hot trends in our regular live streams. You can use the comment function to ask our experts your beauty questions.
